attributes.action: Abolish charging patients, visitors and staff to park in hospital car parks.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Whether transporting an accident victim or collapsed patient to A&E, or visiting someone in intensive care, A&E, maternity unit, or anywhere else, this is traumatic and distressing without the stress of finding cash for a parking meter and being clamped and heavily fined for staying beyond the time paid for.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence -
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/nhsparking/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
